trends: There have been no other sightings in Nantucket Island
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: took a pic of new kite flying in sky . in pic there is an oval disc like object that is reflecting the sun and seems to even have a field of energy behind it. you have to see pic for yourself
divs: sighting detailsi have never seen a ufo nor still have i live. i was taking a picture of my son'ts new kite flying in sky at the beach this am on nantucket island, ma. long story short i got home and was looking at the pictures and noticed that next to the kite flying in the sky my camera took a picture of something else as well. there was not a cloud in the sky and this object seems to be translucent but also has a definate disc\orb like shape to it. the stangest part of the picture is that the object is reflectng light back towards the sun and you can even clearly see an energy field around the object. i dont know what to make of it. ineed a professional opioion of what it is. i have been staring at it for hours and it had me convinced enough to find this website to get another opinion. like i stated idid not see it with my own eyes nor was i looking for it but my camera did and took a very clear picture of something with a definite shape,reflection, @ what seems to be like an energy type exhaust following behind it like a force field or something. how do i get the video up for people to see and make an opinion? just in case you dont know we are 28 miles out at sea. please let me know what you think asap.
